required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Personal Precise Treatment on Psoriasis and Psoriatic Arthritis
clinical_study.official_title: Personal Precise Treatment on Psoriasis and Psoriatic Arthritis and Investigate the Mechanisms of Biological Agents Induced Systemic Lupus Erythematosus

brief_summary.textblock: Part of psoriasis and psoriatic arthritis patients treated with biologics and met primary failure. Therefore, we are going to create a cell based platform to evaluate the treatment effects of different biologics on psoriasis and psoriatic arthritis patients before prescribed by physicians

detailed_description.textblock: PBMCs isolated from psoriasis and psoriatic arthritis and incubated with Group A streptococcus and different biologics for 24 hours. Cytokines expression in the culture supernatants will be measured and the data can be reference for physician's prescription.

primary_outcome.measure: swelling joint count and tenderness joint count

secondary_outcome.description: paper to investigate patient life quality

arm_group.arm_group_label: Prescreen on psoriasis and psoriatic arthritis treatment
arm_group.description: Prescreen markers from individual PBMCs and choose proper biologics before starting treatment on psoriasis and psoriatic arthritis patients.

intervention.description: Prescreen markers from patient individual PBMCs treating with streptococcus and different biologics.
intervention.arm_group_label: Prescreen on psoriasis and psoriatic arthritis treatment

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- 1. Healthy control without underline disease such as psoriasis and psoriatic arthritis. 2. Psoriasis been diagnosed for over six months and PASI >10. 3.Psoriatic arthritis been diagnosed for over six months and >1 swallow and tender joints
Exclusion Criteria:
- nil
